programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Topstitching and Changing Pocket Angles
programme.desc: Update your wardrobe! Learn how to topstitch and change pocket angles.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Spaghetti Straps - Fringe on Felted Wool - Embroidery on Faux Leather
programme.desc: Learn how to make spaghetti straps, fringe on felted wool and create beautifully cool embroidery on faux leather!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Adding Pockets to a Jacket Sleeve
programme.desc: Angela Wolf adds pockets to the sleeve of a jacket.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Refashion Pants for Zip Off Shorts
programme.desc: Angela Wolf refashions pants to zip off shorts.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Threading the Serger
programme.desc: Angela Wolf shows how to thread a serger.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Serge a Knit Outfit for Travel
programme.desc: Angela Wolf serges a knit outfit for travel.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Serging Knits
programme.desc: Angela Wolf demonstrates serging knits.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Refashion with Lace Inserts
programme.desc: Angela Wolf refashions with lace inserts.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Skirt with Pockets
programme.desc: Learn how to make a beautiful skirt with pockets!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Adding Pockets to Joggers
programme.desc: Learn how to add comfortable pockets to your joggers.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Turn a Sports Bra to a Tank Top
programme.desc: Lean how to turn your sports bra to a tank top!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Lace Insert Knit Top
programme.desc: Learn how to make a lace insert knit top with Angela!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Tank Top Lace Trim
programme.desc: Learn how to make a comfortable tank top with Angela!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: One Armed Tee
programme.desc: Learn how to make a one armed tee with Angela!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Sparking Tableware
programme.desc: Learn how to make sparkling tableware with Angela!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: T-Shirt Dress
programme.desc: Angela shows how to create a dress out of a simple t-shirt.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: Madhubani Art
programme.desc: Gifted Madhubani artist teaches how to create a simple DIY over Madhubani Art.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: Pottery in Pench
programme.desc: Learn everything about Pottery. It's ancient history and evolution with time.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: Nagpur Handicraft
programme.desc: Take a tour of the main design factory of Nagpur to learn how the local artisans make beautiful wooden handicrafts.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: Paper Mache
programme.desc: Bihar's paper mache masters teach how to make unique crafts with paper mache technique.

programme.title: Exploring Indian Crafts: The Art of Indian Canvas Painting
programme.desc: Explore the Art of Canvas Painting with nationally acclaimed artist Amit Dutt, winner of the Indian National Academy Award, Bombay Art Society All India Award and many other prestige awards for his unique canvases. Go on a journey with the renowned Indian painter and watch the art happen.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Bit Storage Cabinet
programme.desc: A wall-hanging cabinet to help you organize and store your drill and router bits.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: And the Walls Came Down!
programme.desc: The moving saga continues as the walls come crashing down!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Air Quality Upgrades
programme.desc: I'll be the first to admit that I have a slight problem: I'm a little paranoid about dust. I want as little of the stuff in the shop air as possible so I continually seek out means to achieve that end. While I do wear a respirator while I work, I frequently have to talk on camera shortly after making cuts that put dust directly into the air.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: A Better Way to Apply Oil Finishes!
programme.desc: Applying oil finishes sparingly is the key to avoiding problems with curing and other flaws in the surface.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Backlit LED Poster Frame Light Box
programme.desc: Nicole and I love movies and we are lucky to have our own home theater room. Just outside that room, is a recess with an outlet on the wall intended for a back-lit poster frame. The one that came with the house was made with fluorescent tubes and was falling apart. So this is my replacement. It features a dimmable LED light strip and a double-sided poster and accEPts 27″ x 40″ posters.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Automate Your Dust Collection with iVac
programme.desc: Blast gates that open and close automatically? Yes, please!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Assembly Table Stand
programme.desc: In this episode, learn with Marc how to create a stable assembly table stand that will hold even the heaviest table.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Assembly Table Top
programme.desc: All fine furniture makers need a good flat assembly table! Learn with Marc how to make a table top for your dream assembly table.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Assembly of an Oneida Dust Gorilla Pro Cyclone Dust Collector
programme.desc: How to assemble an Oneida Dust Gorilla Pro Cyclone.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Assembly of a PM2000 Table Saw
programme.desc: I have been running a PM2000 in my shop for nearly 10 years and the move to Colorado afforded me the opportunity to sell the old one and replace it with a newer version that features a 50″ fence and the heavier duty workbench extension. And I thought it would be a good time to show you how to assemble a Powermatic PM2000.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Swag Stitch
programme.desc: Karyn teaches how to make a swag stitch in this Stitch Along.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Tiny Bowknot Stitches
programme.desc: Bebe shows how to do tiny bowknot stitches in this Stitch Along video.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Fan Cables Stitch
programme.desc: Karyn shows you how to do fan cables stitches in this Stitch Along

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Boxed Bobble Stitch
programme.desc: Marcy demonstrates how to make the boxed bobble stitch in this Stitch Along video.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Aran Braid Stitch
programme.desc: Learn how to make an aran braid stitch with Karyn Newbill in this Stitch Along video.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Wave And Box Stitch
programme.desc: Follow along with Cheryl as she teaches how to make a wave and box stitch.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Close Woven Basket Lattice Stitch
programme.desc: Sandra D. demonstrates how to do the close-woven basket lattice stitches in this Stitch Along.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Cellular Stitch
programme.desc: Karyn shows you how to make a cellular stitch in your knitting.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Feather Faggot Stitch
programme.desc: Nancy shows how to make the feather faggot stitch in your knitting.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Milanese Lace
programme.desc: Chinda teaches how to do the Milanese lace pattern in this Stitch Along video.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Shadow Mosaic #9
programme.desc: Betty goes over Barbara Walker's Shadow Mosaic #9 in this Stitch Along.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Yarn Over Check
programme.desc: Betty teaches how to do yarn-over check patterns in this Stitch Along.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Sailor's Rib
programme.desc: Learn how to make a Sailor's Rib in this easy to follow Stitch Along.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Florentine Freeze
programme.desc: Follow with Cheryl as she teaches this easy tutorial on how to make the Florentine Freeze pattern in your knitting.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Classic Argyle
programme.desc: Karyn demonstrates how to go a classic argyle pattern.

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Quilted Lattice
programme.desc: Teri teaches an easy tutorial on a quilted lattice pattern.

programme.desc: Learn how to make fabric belts, perfect hems, and flat felted seams! And a bonus - your guide into cutting buttonholes.
